import React, { useState } from 'react' import ImageCarousel from './ImageCarousel' const itemsData = { category:"", details: "", location: "" } export default function AddItem() { const [formData, setformData] = useState(itemsData); let slides = [ "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/51/82/ac/5182ac536727d576c78a9320ac62de30.jpg", "https://wallpapercave.com/wp/wp3386769.jpg", "https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/809523.jpg", "https://getwallpapers.com/wallpaper/full/5/c/0/606489.jpg", ]; const onChange = (e)=>{ setformData({...itemsData,[e.target.category]:e.target.name}) } return ( <>
) }
